name: Sweet Girl Mia Dress Up Game
name_original: Sweet Girl Mia Dress Up Game
description:
Sweet Girl Mia lives in the village. His dog's name is Luna. They're going to the party of his girlfriend, Emma, who lives in the city. She has to look like a city girl, not like a country girl. Let's dress it up.

You can choose clothes by touching the menus on the screen.
